title: MCGM shall be the Planning Authority for the areas declared as slum under section 4 of Maharashtra Slum Area (Improvement) Act, 1971 on Municipal land existing prior to 01
clause_text: MCGM shall be the Planning Authority for the areas declared as slum under section 4 of Maharashtra Slum Area (Improvement) Act, 1971 on Municipal land existing prior to 01.01.2000 or date as notified by Govt., wherein slum area do not constitute more than 50% of the plot area under redevelopment, in such cases the Planning Authority shall be as decided by Municipal Commissioner.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order

source_pdf.text_snippet: MCGM shall be the Planning Authority for the areas declared as slum under section 4 of Maharashtra Slum Area (Improvement) Act, 1971 on Municipal land existing prior to 01.01.2000 or date as notified
